name: Parasocial
description:
Note: Was made within 24 logged hours as a self-imposed game jam. Parasocial is a recreation of Discount Slender

Throw rubbish at the parasocial andy to slow them down and gain your viewers!

Developed proudly by

  • Tiger Collins - itch.io , portfolio

Parasocial relationships can be simplified to the following; Having an affinity or liking to someone you've never met or doesn't know you exist, resulting in possessive behaviour over the other person.

These relationships are common amongst those who consume content on social media, especially Youtube and Twitch.tv.  

So, how about you live a moment in the life of a streamer who is broadcasting their camping trip but you're being followed by a viewer. Unfortunately, you also want to grow your audience, so you have to balance entertaining your gremlin viewers with surviving the parasocial andy

Features

  • Full Controller Support: Whether you want a laid-back experience or just want to play as if you're on a home console, Parasocial has complete controller support.
  • Environment:  You the environment to lose track of the parasocial andy, but will your viewers find it interesting?
  • Changing Enemies: Parasocial andy's change appearance every time and change speed depending on how long you're streaming for, so it's never the same each moment!
